publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-545 Dr Richard Simpson: Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover-That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Bank of Scotland on its takeover of the National Westminster Bank; welcomes its commitment to keep the headquarters of the new company in Scotland and, whilst noting the need to ensure efficiency in the best interests of both customers and employees, urges sensitivity in working with the banking union in achieving any necessary changes.
S1M-545 Royal Bank of Scotland Take over (lodged on 14 February 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-545 Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover (lodged on 14 February 2000) Elaine Thomson*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Ben Wallace*
S1M-545 Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover (lodged on 14 February 2000) Brian Adam*

S1M-545 Dr Richard Simpson: Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Bank of Scotland on its takeover of the National Westminster Bank; welcomes its commitment to keep the headquarters of the new company in Scotland and, whilst noting the need to ensure efficiency in the best interests of both customers and employees, urges sensitivity in working with the banking union in achieving any necessary changes. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Thomson, Mr Keith Raffan, Ben Wallace, Brian Adam
S1M-545 Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover (lodged on 14 February 2000) Mr David Davidson*, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-545 Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover (lodged on 14 February 2000) Phil Gallie*

S1M-545 Dr Richard Simpson: Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Bank of Scotland on its takeover of the National Westminster Bank; welcomes its commitment to keep the headquarters of the new company in Scotland and, whilst noting the need to ensure efficiency in the best interests of both customers and employees, urges sensitivity in working with the banking union in achieving any necessary changes. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Thomson, Mr Keith Raffan, Ben Wallace, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Mary Scanlon, Phil Gallie
S1M-545 Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover (lodged on 14 February 2000) Mr Brian Monteith*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-545 Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover (lodged on 14 February 2000) Nick Johnston*

S1M-545 Dr Richard Simpson: Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Bank of Scotland on its takeover of the National Westminster Bank; welcomes its commitment to keep the headquarters of the new company in Scotland and, whilst noting the need to ensure efficiency in the best interests of both customers and employees, urges sensitivity in working with the banking union in achieving any necessary changes. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Thomson, Mr Keith Raffan, Ben Wallace, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Mary Scanlon, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Donald Gorrie, Nick Johnston
S1M-545 Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover (lodged on 14 February 2000) Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-545 Dr Richard Simpson: Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Bank of Scotland on its takeover of the National Westminster Bank; welcomes its commitment to keep the headquarters of the new company in Scotland and, whilst noting the need to ensure efficiency in the best interests of both customers and employees, urges sensitivity in working with the banking union in achieving any necessary changes. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Thomson, Mr Keith Raffan, Ben Wallace, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Mary Scanlon, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Donald Gorrie, Nick Johnston, Maureen Macmillan

S1M-545 Dr Richard Simpson: Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Bank of Scotland on its takeover of the National Westminster Bank; welcomes its commitment to keep the headquarters of the new company in Scotland and, whilst noting the need to ensure efficiency in the best interests of both customers and employees, urges sensitivity in working with the banking union in achieving any necessary changes. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Thomson, Mr Keith Raffan, Ben Wallace, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Mary Scanlon, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Donald Gorrie, Nick Johnston, Maureen Macmillan

Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Thomson, Mr Keith Raffan, Ben Wallace, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Mary Scanlon, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Donald Gorrie, Nick Johnston, Maureen Macmillan

S1M-545 Dr Richard Simpson: Royal Bank of Scotland Takeover—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Bank of Scotland on its takeover of the National Westminster Bank; welcomes its commitment to keep the headquarters of the new company in Scotland and, whilst noting the need to ensure efficiency in the best interests of both customers and employees, urges sensitivity in working with the banking union in achieving any necessary changes. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Thomson, Mr Keith Raffan, Ben Wallace, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Mary Scanlon, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Donald Gorrie, Nick Johnston, Maureen Macmillan
